description: '''Gabriele''' "'''Gabry'''" '''Ponte''' ({{IPA|it|ɡabriˈɛːle ˈɡaːbri ˈponte}}; born 20 April 1973) is an Italian musician, DJ and producer, best known as a member of [[Eiffel 65]]. He represented {{Esccnty|San Marino|y=2025}} in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2025]] with his song "[[Tutta l'Italia]]", qualifying for the grand final.
